verses.verse: Elihu <S%H453><s%> also proceeded, <S%H3254><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%>
Suffer <S%H3803><s%> me a little, <S%H2191><s%> and I will show <S%H2331><s%> thee that <S%H3588><s%> I have yet <S%H5750><s%> to speak <S%H4405><s%> on God's <S%H433><s%> behalf.
I will fetch <S%H5375><s%> my knowledge <S%H1843><s%> from afar, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H7350><s%> and will ascribe <S%H5414><s%> righteousness <S%H6664><s%> to my Maker. <S%H6466><s%>
For <S%H3588><s%> truly <S%H551><s%> my words <S%H4405><s%> shall not <S%H3808><s%> be false: <S%H8267><s%> he that is perfect <S%H8549><s%> in knowledge <S%H1844><s%> is with <S%H5973><s%> thee.
Behold, <S%H2005><s%> God <S%H410><s%> is mighty, <S%H3524><s%> and despiseth <S%H3988><s%> not <S%H3808><s%> any: he is mighty <S%H3524><s%> in strength <S%H3581><s%> and wisdom. <S%H3820><s%>
He preserveth not the life <S%H2421><s%> <S%H3808><s%> of the wicked: <S%H7563><s%> but giveth <S%H5414><s%> right <S%H4941><s%> to the poor. <S%H6041><s%>

He withdraweth <S%H1639><s%> not <S%H3808><s%> his eyes <S%H5869><s%> from the righteous: <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6662><s%> but with <S%H854><s%> kings <S%H4428><s%> are they on the throne; <S%H3678><s%> yea, he doth establish <S%H3427><s%> them forever, <S%H5331><s%> and they are exalted. <S%H1361><s%>
And if <S%H518><s%> they be bound <S%H631><s%> in fetters, <S%H2131><s%> and be holden <S%H3920><s%> in cords <S%H2256><s%> of affliction; <S%H6040><s%>
Then he showeth <S%H5046><s%> them their work, <S%H6467><s%> and their transgressions <S%H6588><s%> that <S%H3588><s%> they have exceeded. <S%H1396><s%>
He openeth <S%H1540><s%> also their ear <S%H241><s%> to discipline, <S%H4148><s%> and commandeth <S%H559><s%> that <S%H3588><s%> they return <S%H7725><s%> from iniquity. <S%H4480><s%> <S%H205><s%>

If <S%H518><s%> they obey <S%H8085><s%> and serve <S%H5647><s%> him, they shall spend <S%H3615><s%> their days <S%H3117><s%> in prosperity, <S%H2896><s%> and their years <S%H8141><s%> in pleasures. <S%H5273><s%>

But if <S%H518><s%> they obey <S%H8085><s%> not, <S%H3808><s%> they shall perish <S%H5674><s%> by the sword, <S%H7973><s%> and they shall die <S%H1478><s%> without <S%H1097><s%> knowledge. <S%H1847><s%>
But the hypocrites <S%H2611><s%> in heart <S%H3820><s%> heap up <S%H7760><s%> wrath: <S%H639><s%> they cry <S%H7768><s%> not <S%H3808><s%> when <S%H3588><s%> he bindeth <S%H631><s%> them.
They <S%H5315><s%> die <S%H4191><s%> in youth, <S%H5290><s%> and their life <S%H2416><s%> is among the unclean. <S%H6945><s%>
He delivereth <S%H2502><s%> the poor <S%H6041><s%> in his affliction, <S%H6040><s%> and openeth <S%H1540><s%> their ears <S%H241><s%> in oppression. <S%H3906><s%>

Even so <S%H637><s%> would he have removed <S%H5496><s%> thee out of the strait <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6310><s%> <S%H6862><s%> into a broad place, <S%H7338><s%> where <S%H8478><s%> there is no <S%H3808><s%> straitness; <S%H4164><s%> and that which should be set <S%H5183><s%> on thy table <S%H7979><s%> should be full <S%H4390><s%> of fatness. <S%H1880><s%>
But thou hast fulfilled <S%H4390><s%> the judgment <S%H1779><s%> of the wicked: <S%H7563><s%> judgment <S%H1779><s%> and justice <S%H4941><s%> take hold <S%H8551><s%> on thee.

Because <S%H3588><s%> there is wrath, <S%H2534><s%> beware lest <S%H6435><s%> he take thee away <S%H5496><s%> with his stroke: <S%H5607><s%> then a great <S%H7227><s%> ransom <S%H3724><s%> cannot <S%H408><s%> deliver <S%H5186><s%> thee.
Will he esteem <S%H6186><s%> thy riches? <S%H7769><s%> no, not <S%H3808><s%> gold, <S%H1222><s%> nor all <S%H3605><s%> the forces <S%H3981><s%> of strength. <S%H3581><s%>
Desire <S%H7602><s%> not <S%H408><s%> the night, <S%H3915><s%> when people <S%H5971><s%> are cut off <S%H5927><s%> in their place. <S%H8478><s%>

Take heed, <S%H8104><s%> regard not <S%H6437><s%> <S%H408><s%> <S%H413><s%> iniquity: <S%H205><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> <S%H5921><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> hast thou chosen <S%H977><s%> rather than affliction. <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6040><s%>
Behold, <S%H2005><s%> God <S%H410><s%> exalteth <S%H7682><s%> by his power: <S%H3581><s%> who <S%H4310><s%> teacheth <S%H3384><s%> like him? <S%H3644><s%>
Who <S%H4310><s%> hath enjoined <S%H6485><s%> <S%H5921><s%> him his way? <S%H1870><s%> or who <S%H4310><s%> can say, <S%H559><s%> Thou hast wrought <S%H6466><s%> iniquity? <S%H5766><s%>
Remember <S%H2142><s%> that <S%H3588><s%> thou magnify <S%H7679><s%> his work, <S%H6467><s%> which <S%H834><s%> men <S%H376><s%> behold. <S%H7789><s%>
Every <S%H3605><s%> man <S%H120><s%> may see <S%H2372><s%> it; man <S%H582><s%> may behold <S%H5027><s%> it afar off. <S%H4480><s%> <S%H7350><s%>

Behold, <S%H2005><s%> God <S%H410><s%> is great, <S%H7689><s%> and we know <S%H3045><s%> him not <S%H3808><s%> neither <S%H3808><s%> can the number <S%H4557><s%> of his years <S%H8141><s%> be searched out. <S%H2714><s%>
For <S%H3588><s%> he maketh small <S%H1639><s%> the drops <S%H5198><s%> of water: <S%H4325><s%> they pour down <S%H2212><s%> rain <S%H4306><s%> according to the vapor <S%H108><s%> thereof:
Which <S%H834><s%> the clouds <S%H7834><s%> do drop <S%H5140><s%> and distill <S%H7491><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> man <S%H120><s%> abundantly. <S%H7227><s%>
Also <S%H637><s%> <S%H518><s%> can any understand <S%H995><s%> the spreadings <S%H4666><s%> of the clouds, <S%H5645><s%> or the noise <S%H8663><s%> of his tabernacle? <S%H5521><s%>
Behold, <S%H2005><s%> he spreadeth <S%H6566><s%> his light <S%H216><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> it, and covereth <S%H3680><s%> the bottom <S%H8328><s%> of the sea. <S%H3220><s%>
For <S%H3588><s%> by them judgeth <S%H1777><s%> he the people; <S%H5971><s%> he giveth <S%H5414><s%> meat <S%H400><s%> in abundance. <S%H4342><s%>
With <S%H5921><s%> clouds <S%H3709><s%> he covereth <S%H3680><s%> the light; <S%H216><s%> and commandeth <S%H6680><s%> it not to shine by <S%H5921><s%> the cloud that cometh between. <S%H6293><s%>
The noise <S%H7452><s%> thereof showeth <S%H5046><s%> concerning <S%H5921><s%> it, the cattle <S%H4735><s%> also <S%H637><s%> concerning <S%H5921><s%> the vapor. <S%H5927><s%>
